metadata.title: CVE-2024-2874 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before16.10.6, version 16.11 before 16.11.3, and 17.0 before 17.0.1. A runnerregistered with a crafted description has the potential to disrupt theloading of targeted GitLab web resources.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
